messages.missing_permissions: ❌ You don't have enough permissions to execute this command.
messages.invalid_command: ❌ Unknown command. Use **!mk help** to see the available commands.
messages.cooldown_error: ❌ You type too fast. Please retry in **{}** seconds.
help_field1_value:
⠀
**help** - Shows all the available commands.
**status** - Shows the status of the bot's services and settings on this server.
⠀
help_field2_value:
⠀
**select [#text-channel]** - Select the channel where AutomatiK will send messages to this server.
**unselect** - Unselects the previously selected channel. Your server won't receive new messages.

**enable/disable (ServiceID)** - Command to enable/disable AutomatiK services.
**services** - Shows information about loaded services and their **ServiceID**s.
**mention (@MyRole)** - Select which role will be mentioned in AutomatiK's messages.

**language (LangID)** - Change the language of the messages.
**languages** - Shows information about language packages and their **LangID**s.
⠀
help_field3_value:
⠀
**start/stop** - starts/stops the bot's main service globally.
**reload** - Reloads configuration, services and language packages.
**stats** - Shows some overall statistics of the bot.
**shutdown** - Shuts down the bot completely.
messages.status_description: Check the status of the bot's services and settings on this server.
messages.unselect_already: ❌ There is not a selected channel yet.
messages.services_description: Services are extensions that expand the bot's functionality. The **ServiceID** column contains the way each service must be called by in commands.
messages.mention_error: ❌ The introduced role is not valid.
messages.languages_description: The **LangID** column contains the way each language package must be called by in commands.
messages.stats_description: Shows additional information and stats about this bot's instance.
messages.stats_message_queue_value: There are approximated **{}** messages waiting to be delivered.
messages.stats_message_queue_empty_value: No messages are waiting to be delivered.
messages.shutdown_abort: ❌ There are still **{}** messages waiting to be delivered. Try again later.
generic_messages: {} can be found for free on {}
messages.channel_description: From here you can manage the notification channel for free games.
messages.select_channel_instruction: Please select a channel to receive free game notifications.
